panels.title: Query-frontend - query splitting and results cache

panels.description:
### Intervals per query
The average number of split queries (partitioned by time) executed a single input query.
panels.title: Intervals per query

targets.expr:
# Query metrics before and after migration to new memcached backend.
sum (
  rate(cortex_cache_hits{name=~"frontend.+", cluster=~"$cluster", job=~"($namespace)/((query-frontend.*|cortex|mimir|mimir-read.*))"}[5m])
  or
  rate(thanos_cache_memcached_hits_total{name="frontend-cache", cluster=~"$cluster", job=~"($namespace)/((query-frontend.*|cortex|mimir|mimir-read.*))"}[5m])
)
/
sum (
  rate(cortex_cache_fetched_keys{name=~"frontend.+", cluster=~"$cluster", job=~"($namespace)/((query-frontend.*|cortex|mimir|mimir-read.*))"}[5m])
  or
  rate(thanos_cache_memcached_requests_total{name=~"frontend-cache", cluster=~"$cluster", job=~"($namespace)/((query-frontend.*|cortex|mimir|mimir-read.*))"}[5m])
)

# Query metrics before and after migration to new memcached backend.
sum (
  rate(cortex_cache_fetched_keys{name=~"frontend.+", cluster=~"$cluster", job=~"($namespace)/((query-frontend.*|cortex|mimir|mimir-read.*))"}[5m])
  or
  rate(thanos_cache_memcached_requests_total{name="frontend-cache", cluster=~"$cluster", job=~"($namespace)/((query-frontend.*|cortex|mimir|mimir-read.*))"}[5m])
)
-
sum (
  rate(cortex_cache_hits{name=~"frontend.+", cluster=~"$cluster", job=~"($namespace)/((query-frontend.*|cortex|mimir|mimir-read.*))"}[5m])
  or
  rate(thanos_cache_memcached_hits_total{name=~"frontend-cache", cluster=~"$cluster", job=~"($namespace)/((query-frontend.*|cortex|mimir|mimir-read.*))"}[5m])
)

panels.description:
### Query results cache skipped
The % of queries whose results could not be cached.
It is tracked for each split query when the splitting by interval is enabled.
panels.title: Query results cache skipped

panels.description:
### Sharded queries ratio
The % of queries that have been successfully rewritten and executed in a shardable way.
This panel only takes into account the type of queries that are supported by query sharding (eg. range queries).
panels.title: Sharded queries ratio

panels.description:
### Number of sharded queries per query
The number of sharded queries that have been executed for a single input query. It only tracks queries that
have been successfully rewritten in a shardable way.
panels.title: Number of sharded queries per query
Number of store-gateways hit per query
Refetches of missing blocks per query

targets.expr:
sum by(data_type) (
  # non-streaming store-gateway will not have the stage label on any fetched metrics
  rate(cortex_bucket_store_series_data_fetched_sum{component="store-gateway", stage="", cluster=~"$cluster", job=~"($namespace)/((store-gateway.*|cortex|mimir|mimir-backend.*))"}[5m])
  or
  # streaming store-gateway with new caching will have overlapping metrics for fetched chunks data; we select only the most narrow one - "fetched"
  rate(cortex_bucket_store_series_data_fetched_sum{component="store-gateway", data_type="chunks", stage="fecthed", cluster=~"$cluster", job=~"($namespace)/((store-gateway.*|cortex|mimir|mimir-backend.*))"}[5m])
)

sum by(data_type) (
  # non-streaming store-gateway will not have the stage label on any touched metrics
  rate(cortex_bucket_store_series_data_touched_sum{component="store-gateway", stage="",cluster=~"$cluster", job=~"($namespace)/((store-gateway.*|cortex|mimir|mimir-backend.*))"}[5m])
  or
  # streaming store-gateway with new caching will have overlapping metrics for touched chunks data; we select only the most narrow one - "returned"
  rate(cortex_bucket_store_series_data_touched_sum{component="store-gateway", data_type="chunks", stage="returned",cluster=~"$cluster", job=~"($namespace)/((store-gateway.*|cortex|mimir|mimir-backend.*))"}[5m])
)

panels.description:
### Series batch preloading efficiency
This panel shows the % of time reduced by preloading, for Series() requests which have been
split to 2+ batches. If a Series() request is served within a single batch, then preloading
is not triggered, and thus not counted in this measurement.

targets.expr:
# Clamping min to 0 because if preloading not useful at all, then the actual value we get is
# slightly negative because of the small overhead introduced by preloading.
clamp_min(1 - (
    sum(rate(cortex_bucket_store_series_batch_preloading_wait_duration_seconds_sum{cluster=~"$cluster", job=~"($namespace)/((store-gateway.*|cortex|mimir|mimir-backend.*))"}[5m]))
    /
    sum(rate(cortex_bucket_store_series_batch_preloading_load_duration_seconds_sum{cluster=~"$cluster", job=~"($namespace)/((store-gateway.*|cortex|mimir|mimir-backend.*))"}[5m]))
), 0)

panels.title: Series batch preloading efficiency (streaming enabled)
Chunks attributes in-memory cache hit ratio
